text: Saul Zaentz ( (February 28, 1921 - January 3, 2014) was an American movie producer. He also owned a record company. He won the Academy Award for Best Picture three times. In 1996, he was awarded the Irving G. Thalberg Memorial Award. Zaentz died in San Francisco, California. He was suffering from Alzheimer's disease. He was 92 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== *IMDB Profile *The Saul Zaentz Company *Zaentz Media Center official site Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in San Francisco Category:Movie producers from New Jersey Category:People from Passaic, New Jersey
title: Saul Zaentz
